title: Enhancing Clinical Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Mathematical Competencies for Pre-Medical Undergraduates

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Acquire core concepts of calculus and vector analysis necessary for solving physics problems through MOOCs with at least 80% proficiency.
Assess the ability to apply physics problem-solving skills using a clicker-based feedback system in real-time face-to-face classes.
Enhance the ability to mathematically model complex physical phenomena through collaborative activities among learners in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
